content: लड् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (लडति) To play, sport, dally. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> (लडति, लडयति) {@--1@} To throw, toss. {@--2@} To blame. {@--3@} To loll the tongue. {@--4@} To harass, annoy. {vIII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> ( लाडयति-ते) {@--1@} To fondle, caress. {@--2@} To annoy.
